title: U.S. East Coast Braces for Hurricane Florence
description:
The outer bands of Hurricane Florence reached the Carolina coast, bringing stinging winds and lashing rain. The storm is expected to make landfall overnight. Claire Obusan speaks with Bloomberg News reporter Brian K. Sullivan.
FOLLOW UP
Brian's latest: Florence Begins Assault on Carolina Outer Banks, Landfall Looms
You can follow Brian @WeatherSullivan 
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
